author: Anonymous Calc
title: EdX Expressions Practice Question 3
question:
Based on the examples provided under the 'forming expressions' sub-heading under the Languages tab, and that "Racket evaluates expressions to produce values" from the video, I thought that (+ 2 3) and (sqrt 2) would be expressions. However that is not correct. 
Any pointers?
student_answer: Those are not the only expressions in the list of options
